channel.title: FreePromptHub - Content Creation Prompts
channel.description: Latest Content Creation AI prompts from FreePromptHub

item.title: Social Media Bio Creator Prompt - Content | FreePromptHub
item.description: Social Media Bio Creator - Write the perfect bio for Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, or TikTok. Stand out in 150 characters or less.

item.title: Thank You Note Generator Prompt - Content | FreePromptHub
item.description: Thank You Note Generator - Write heartfelt thank you messages for gifts, help, or kindness. Never struggle with what to say again.

item.title: YouTube Script Generator Prompt - Content | FreePromptHub
item.description: YouTube Script Generator prompt that creates viral video scripts with perfect hooks, high retention, and CTAs that drive views, subscribers, and engagement.

item.title: Birthday Message Writer Prompt - Content | FreePromptHub
item.description: Birthday Message Writer - Write personal birthday wishes that don't sound generic. Perfect messages for cards, texts, or social media posts.

item.title: SEO Blog Post Writer Prompt - Content | FreePromptHub
item.description: SEO Blog Post Writer prompt that creates engaging, Google-optimized articles that rank on page 1 and drive organic traffic to your website.

item.title: Complaint Email Writer Prompt - Content | FreePromptHub
item.description: Complaint Email Writer - Get refunds, replacements, and resolutions. Write complaint emails that companies actually respond to.

item.title: Sales Copy Writer Prompt - Content | FreePromptHub
item.description: Sales Copy Writer prompt that creates high-converting copy for landing pages, sales pages, ads, and emails using proven psychological triggers and conversion formulas.

item.title: Dating Profile Writer Prompt - Content | FreePromptHub
item.description: Dating Profile Writer - Create an authentic dating profile that gets matches. Stand out on Tinder, Bumble, Hinge, and other dating apps.

item.title: Instagram Caption Writer Prompt - Content | FreePromptHub
item.description: Instagram Caption Writer - Create engaging captions that get likes and comments. Perfect captions for any photo in seconds.

item.title: Email Newsletter Creator Prompt - Content | FreePromptHub
item.description: Email Newsletter Creator prompt that writes engaging newsletters with high open rates, click-through rates, and subscriber retention for consistent audience growth.
